channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Beach Cleanups in Northeastern Taiwan Held To Help Breeding Seabirds
item.description: People on Taiwan’s northeast coast are picking up trash on the beaches just in time for the seabird breeding season. Seabirds lay their eggs on Yilan’s beaches between May and Augu

item.title: Taiwan’s Pommel Horse Prince Fails To Secure Olympic Ticket
item.description: Olympic medallist Lee Chih-kai has failed to secure a place at the Paris Olympics after missing out on gold at the Doha qualifier.

item.title: World's Largest Digital Astronomy Camera Completed
item.description: The world’s biggest digital astronomy camera is ready to be shipped to its new home in Chile.

item.title: Residents of Damaged Hualien Apartments Debate Future After Earthquake
item.description: Residents of Hualien County apartment blocks left uninhabitable by this month's magnitude 7.2 earthquake debate whether to reinforce their homes or demolish and rebuild.
